verses.verse: And as He was <S%G1607>going<s%> out of the <S%G2413>temple,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G1320>"Teacher,<s%> <S%G2396>behold<s%> <S%G4217>what<s%> <S%G4217>wonderful<s%> <S%G3037>stones<s%> and <S%G4217>what<s%> <S%G4217>wonderful<s%> <S%G3619>buildings!<s%>"

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, "Do you <S%G991>see<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3619>buildings<s%>? Not one <S%G3037>stone<s%> shall be <S%G863>left<s%> upon <S%G3037>another<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> will not be <S%G2647>torn<s%> <S%G2647>down.<s%>"

And as He was <S%G2521>sitting<s%> on the <S%G3735>Mount<s%> of <S%G1636>Olives<s%> <S%G2713>opposite<s%> the <S%G2413>temple,<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> and <S%G2385>James<s%> and <S%G2491>John<s%> and <S%G406>Andrew<s%> were <S%G1905>questioning<s%> Him <S%G2596>privately,<s%> <S%G2398><s%>

<S%G3004>"Tell<s%> us, <S%G4219>when<s%> will <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> be, and <S%G5101>what<s%> [will be] the <S%G4592>sign<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> are <S%G3195>going<s%> to be <S%G4931>fulfilled<s%>?"
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%> to them, <S%G991>"See<s%> to it that <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G4105>misleads<s%> you.
<S%G4183>"Many<s%> will <S%G2064>come<s%> in My <S%G3686>name,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> 'I <S%G1510>am<s%> [He!'] and will <S%G4105>mislead<s%> <S%G4183>many.<s%>

"And <S%G3752>when<s%> you <S%G191>hear<s%> of <S%G4171>wars<s%> and <S%G189>rumors<s%> of <S%G4171>wars,<s%> do not be <S%G2360>frightened;<s%> [those things] <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G1096>take<s%> <S%G1096>place;<s%> but [that is] not <S%G3768>yet<s%> the <S%G5056>end.<s%>

"For <S%G1484>nation<s%> will <S%G1453>arise<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G1484>nation,<s%> and <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G932>kingdom;<s%> there will be <S%G4578>earthquakes<s%> in <S%G2596>various<s%> <S%G5117>places;<s%> there will [also] be <S%G3042>famines.<s%> <S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> are [merely] the <S%G746>beginning<s%> of <S%G5604>birth<s%> <S%G5604>pangs.<s%>

"But be on your <S%G991>guard;<s%> for they will <S%G3860>deliver<s%> you to [the] <S%G4892>courts,<s%> and you will be <S%G1194>flogged<s%> in [the] <S%G4864>synagogues,<s%> and you will <S%G2476>stand<s%> <S%G1909>before<s%> <S%G2232>governors<s%> and <S%G935>kings<s%> for My <S%G1752>sake,<s%> as a <S%G3142>testimony<s%> to them.
"And the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> be <S%G2784>preached<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1484>nations.<s%>

"And <S%G3752>when<s%> they <S%G71>arrest<s%> you and <S%G3860>deliver<s%> you up, do not be <S%G4305>anxious<s%> <S%G4305>beforehand<s%> about <S%G5101>what<s%> you are to <S%G2980>say,<s%> but <S%G2980>say<s%> <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> is <S%G1325>given<s%> you in that <S%G5610>hour;<s%> for it is not you who <S%G2980>speak,<s%> but [it is] the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>

"And <S%G80>brother<s%> will <S%G3860>deliver<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> to <S%G2288>death,<s%> and a <S%G3962>father<s%> [his] <S%G5043>child;<s%> and <S%G5043>children<s%> will <S%G1881>rise<s%> up <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G1118>parents<s%> and have them <S%G2289>put<s%> to <S%G2289>death.<s%>
"And you will be <S%G3404>hated<s%> by <S%G3956>all<s%> on <S%G1223>account<s%> of My <S%G3686>name,<s%> but the one who <S%G5278>endures<s%> to the <S%G5056>end,<s%> he shall be <S%G4982>saved.<s%>

"But <S%G3752>when<s%> you <S%G3708>see<s%> the <S%G946>abomination<s%> of <S%G2050>desolation<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> it <S%G1163>should<s%> not be (let the <S%G314>reader<s%> <S%G3539>understand<s%>), <S%G5119>then<s%> let <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> are in <S%G2453>Judea<s%> <S%G5343>flee<s%> to the <S%G3735>mountains.<s%>

"And let him <S%G3588>who<s%> is on the <S%G1430>housetop<s%> not <S%G2597>go<s%> <S%G2597>down,<s%> <S%G3366>or<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> in, to <S%G142>get<s%> <S%G5100>anything<s%> out of his <S%G3614>house;<s%>
and let him <S%G3588>who<s%> is in the <S%G68>field<s%> not <S%G1994>turn<s%> <S%G3694>back<s%> <S%G1994><s%> to <S%G142>get<s%> his <S%G2440>cloak.<s%>
"But <S%G3759>woe<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who are with <S%G1722>child<s%> <S%G1064><s%> and to <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2337>nurse<s%> <S%G2337>babes<s%> in <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days!<s%>
"But <S%G4336>pray<s%> that it may not <S%G1096>happen<s%> in the <S%G5494>winter.<s%>

"For <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> will be a [time of] <S%G2347>tribulation<s%> <S%G3634>such<s%> as has not <S%G1096>occurred<s%> <S%G575>since<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%> of the <S%G2937>creation<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2936>created,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G3568>now,<s%> and <S%G3756>never<s%> <S%G3361><s%> shall.

"And <S%G1487>unless<s%> <S%G3361><s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> had <S%G2856>shortened<s%> [those] <S%G2250>days,<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G4561>life<s%> would have been <S%G4982>saved;<s%> but for the <S%G1223>sake<s%> of the <S%G1588>elect<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> He <S%G1586>chose,<s%> He <S%G2856>shortened<s%> the <S%G2250>days.<s%>

"And <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> to you, <S%G2396>'Behold,<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> is the <S%G5547>Christ<s%>'; or, <S%G2396>'Behold,<s%> [He is] <S%G1563>there<s%>'; do not <S%G4100>believe<s%> [him;]

for <S%G5580>false<s%> <S%G5580>Christs<s%> and <S%G5578>false<s%> <S%G5578>prophets<s%> will <S%G1453>arise,<s%> and will <S%G4160>show<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%> and <S%G5059>wonders,<s%> in <S%G4314>order,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1415>possible,<s%> to <S%G635>lead<s%> the <S%G1588>elect<s%> <S%G635>astray.<s%>
"But <S%G991>take<s%> <S%G991>heed;<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> I have <S%G4275>told<s%> you <S%G3956>everything<s%> in <S%G4275>advance.<s%>

"But in <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> that <S%G2347>tribulation,<s%> the <S%G2246>sun<s%> will be <S%G4654>darkened,<s%> and the <S%G4582>moon<s%> will not <S%G1325>give<s%> its <S%G5338>light,<s%>
and the <S%G792>stars<s%> will be <S%G4098>falling<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and the <S%G1411>powers<s%> that are in the <S%G3772>heavens<s%> will be <S%G4531>shaken.<s%>
"And <S%G5119>then<s%> they will <S%G3708>see<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> in <S%G3507>clouds<s%> with <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%> and <S%G1391>glory.<s%>

"And <S%G5119>then<s%> He will <S%G649>send<s%> <S%G649>forth<s%> the <S%G32>angels,<s%> and will <S%G1996>gather<s%> <S%G1996>together<s%> His <S%G1588>elect<s%> from the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G417>winds,<s%> from the <S%G206>farthest<s%> <S%G206>end<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> to the <S%G206>farthest<s%> <S%G206>end<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

<S%G1161>"Now<s%> <S%G3129>learn<s%> the <S%G3850>parable<s%> from the <S%G4808>fig<s%> <S%G4808>tree:<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> its <S%G2798>branch<s%> has <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G527>tender,<s%> and <S%G1631>puts<s%> <S%G1631>forth<s%> its <S%G5444>leaves,<s%> you <S%G1097>know<s%> that <S%G2330>summer<s%> is <S%G1451>near.<s%>

"Even <S%G3779>so,<s%> you <S%G2532>too,<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> you <S%G3708>see<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> <S%G1096>happening,<s%> <S%G1097>recognize<s%> that He is <S%G1451>near,<s%> [right] at the <S%G2374>door.<s%>

<S%G281>"Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1074>generation<s%> will not <S%G3928>pass<s%> <S%G3928>away<s%> <S%G3360>until<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> <S%G1096>take<s%> <S%G1096>place.<s%>
<S%G3772>"Heaven<s%> and <S%G1093>earth<s%> will <S%G3928>pass<s%> <S%G3928>away,<s%> but My <S%G3056>words<s%> will not <S%G3928>pass<s%> <S%G3928>away.<s%>

"But of that <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G3609>knows,<s%> not <S%G3761>even<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> the <S%G5207>Son,<s%> but the <S%G3962>Father<s%> [alone.]
<S%G991>"Take<s%> <S%G991>heed,<s%> <S%G69>keep<s%> on the <S%G69>alert;<s%> for you do not <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G4219>when<s%> the [appointed] <S%G2540>time<s%> is.

["It is] <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G590>away<s%> on a <S%G590>journey,<s%> [who] upon <S%G863>leaving<s%> his <S%G3614>house<s%> and <S%G1325>putting<s%> his <S%G1401>slaves<s%> in <S%G1849>charge,<s%> [assigning] to <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1538>one<s%> his <S%G2041>task,<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1781>commanded<s%> the <S%G2377>doorkeeper<s%> to <S%G1127>stay<s%> on the <S%G1127>alert.<s%>

<S%G3767>"Therefore,<s%> be on the <S%G1127>alert<s%> – for you do not <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G4219>when<s%> the <S%G2962>master<s%> of the <S%G3614>house<s%> is <S%G2064>coming,<s%> <S%G2228>whether<s%> in the <S%G3796>evening,<s%> at <S%G3317>midnight,<s%> at <S%G219>cockcrowing,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> in the <S%G4404>morning<s%> –
<S%G3361>lest<s%> he <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1810>suddenly<s%> and <S%G2147>find<s%> you <S%G2518>asleep.<s%>
"And <S%G3739>what<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you I <S%G3004>say<s%> to <S%G3956>all,<s%> 'Be on the <S%G1127>alert!<s%>'"
